t:
The boy cried ‘WOLF’ and the villagers came running to help, but of course there wasn't any wolf.

                   -------------------

The girl cried ‘WOLF’ and the villagers came running to tell her that it was just a dog,
    and anyways, she shouldn't be going out of her house wearing such short dresses or talk to the boys — that kind of behaviour will bring the wolf upon her.
c:
The wolves in us. The lies we speak. The difference in thoughts we have. The different lessons we teach our sons vs our daughters.
We believe our sons so easily but oppress the thoughts of our daughters. When the wolves (rapists) attack them, we just blame them for the incident. So many rape incidents go unreported (like the dog).

What can be done?


The starting, obviously, was taken from the story of the lier shepherd boy.





#rape #wolf #rapist #sexualabuse #sexualharassment #sexualassault #molestation #raiseyourvoice
